title: Policeman lied that mother of his baby raped him to avoid paying child support
text:
Denver Police Office Samuel Sheppard has been fired for claiming that one of his partners raped him after she got pregnant with his baby, because he didn’t want to pay child suppot (Pictures: KDVR)

A police officer was fired for falsely claiming he was raped by the mother of his baby to avoid paying child support.

Officer Samuel Sheppard was fired from the Denver Police Department on September 16 over the false allegation, which he made in April 2018.

That saw Sheppard claim the mother of his child sneaked into his home while he was on leave and ‘got on top of him’ before having sex with him against his will, before getting pregnant.

The crooked cop’s complaint said ‘he believed that the complainant “took advantage of his altered mental state and the medications that he was taking in order to have sex with him.”‘

It is unclear what condition Sheppard claimed to be suffering from, but his lies were exposed after investigators found he’d been off on leave in November 2016, 18 months before claiming the attack took place.

Sheppard’s lies were exposed after investigators found this exchange between him and the mother of his baby the night after they had consensual sex (Picture: KDVR)

Further examination showed that the date the child arrived did not fit with the time Sheppard claim the attack took place.

And anti-corruption detectives further discovered messages between Sheppard and the woman showing he’d picked her up on the night of the alleged assault.

The same text exchange saw Sheppard ask the woman whether she was on birth control the day after, Fox31 reported.

The woman, who has not been named, answered: ‘No,’ prompting Sheppard to say ‘Oh no.’

Denver Police Department Deputy Director of Safety Mary Dulacki wrote: ‘Officer Sheppard made an unfounded sexual assault claim against the complainant seemingly to avoid his financial obligations.

Sheppard is said to have accepted the outcome of the investigation, and does not plan to appeal it.
description: Sam Sheppard from Denver in Colorado fabricated the false rape claim just to avoid paying child support
